Package CST8221C4

Class ControllerConnect4

  • java.lang.Object
    • CST8221C4.ControllerConnect4
  • public class ControllerConnect4
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the ControllerConnect4 which is the Controller, which handles events generated by user interactions with the GUI. This class contains a switch case which handles menu interactions, it calls the methods to handle the interactions. Also contains implementation of switching languages.

        public ModelConnect4 getModel()

      • handleChatInputBox

        public void handleChatInputBox()
        Yet to be implemented

      • handleMenuEvents

        public void handleMenuEvents​(java.lang.String menuItem)
        This method is used to handle all possible interactions with the menu items. Uses a switch case structure, and when a menu item is interacted with, the switch case calls the related method to deal with the action.
        Parameters:
        menuItem - , represents all menu item selection

      • updateView

        public void updateView()
        This method is used to update the view, the view will need to constantly be change due to changes of the state of the board, and alternating players.

      • validatePlay

        public boolean validatePlay​(int column)
        This method is used to check the user play, checks if a token was dropped, and update the board accordingly. Checks if a winner was identified, displays winner message and game is over. Checks if a draw state was identified, displays draw message and game is over. If winner or draw state wasn't identified then players should alternate as well as player labels.
        Parameters:
        column - , represent game board columns
        Returns:
        false if not valid play

      • pauseTimer

        public void pauseTimer()
        This method pauses the timer execution.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method should reset the whole game, if user wants to restart the game. Calls the initializeBoard method from the Model class.

      • switchToEnglish

        public void switchToEnglish()
        This method is used to switch the current language to English. The English language is also known as the default language. Calls the load language method, to perform switch.

      • switchToPersian

        public void switchToPersian()
        This method is used to switch the current language to English. Calls the load language method, to perform switch.

      • loadLanguage

        private void loadLanguage​(java.lang.String language)
        Trying to load a resource bundle containing a file which use key-value pair translations.
        Parameters:
        language - , the specified language

      • displayInstruction

        public void displayInstruction()
        This method is used to display instructions on how to win the game, only displays if user interacts with instruction menu item
